name: OmiWorld_Demo2
description:
Player Movement 

Mouse - - Rotate

W - - Forward 

Shift - - Sprint 

Left Mouse - - Aim 

Right Mouse - - Pull

Right Mouse Release - - Shoot

Welcome to OMIARCHER, another World Building Project. The goal was to build off the previously developed "OmiWorldGenerator", and find ways to further improve environment, space, and animation. 

The objective of this game was to create a foundational Archer game, creating a new level of interaction with the Environment. This project focused on Character Animation, Physics, and AI Enemy controls.
